name: HideandSeek
0:
”Alexa, lets play Hide n Seek.”
”Alexa, ask Hide n Seek to start counting.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hide n. seek
des: This is a fun skill for kids to help with playing hide and seek. Alexa will help your children count as the others hide. Once Alexa gets to your desired count, the person who is seeking the hidden players will be able to start searching!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
